game.title: Isaiah's Prophecy about Jesus
game.grid: HTALKINRKSS EPWOEDDANEHA OPWH VEE LE SN NR GA BO ER NG IS TA HIONLD LI SSHTIH GH TIEMAC TTHGNUS VIEHLITO LADELY WTUWOHSDNI ONBSDAFO
game.phrase: The people who walked in darkness have seen a great light. They lived in a land of shadows, but now light is shining on them. Unto us a Child is born!
